jokes.joke: I went to see the doctor about my short-term memory problems — the first thing he did was make me pay in advance.
Moses had the first tablet that could connect to the cloud.
The New England Journal of Medicine reports that 9 out of 10 doctors agree that 1 out of 10 doctors is an idiot.
The worst time to have a heart attack is during a game of charades.
I was raised as an only child, which really annoyed my sister.
Correct punctuation: the difference between a sentence that's well-written and a sentence that's, well, written.
You’ll never be as lazy as whoever named the fireplace.
The problem with kleptomaniacs is that they always take things literally.
When life gives you melons, you might be dyslexic.
Life is like a box of chocolates. It doesn’t last long if you’re fat.
You can’t lose a homing pigeon. If your homing pigeon doesn’t come back, then what you’ve lost is a pigeon.
One thing you’ll never hear a Hindu say… 'Ah well, you only live once'.
Red sky at night: shepherd’s delight. Blue sky at night: day.
I was watching the London Marathon and saw one runner dressed as a chicken and another runner dressed as an egg. I thought: 'This could be interesting.'
Jokes about white sugar are rare. Jokes about brown sugar, Demerara.

My sister had a baby and they took a while to name her and I was like, 'Hurry up!' because I didn't want my niece to grow up to be one of these kids you hear about on the news where it says, 'The 17 year old defendant, who hasn't been named'.
I took out a loan to pay for an exorcism. If I don’t pay it back, I’m going to get repossessed.
A cowboy asked me if I could help him round up 18 cows. I said, ‘Yes, of course. – That’s 20 cows.
You know, somebody actually complimented me on my driving today. They left a little note on the windscreen, it said 'Parking Fine.' So that was nice.

I was having dinner with my boss and his wife said, 'How many potatoes would you like, Tim?'. I said 'Ooh, I'll just have one please.' She said 'It's OK, you don't have to be polite.' 'Alright,' I said, 'I'll just have one then, you stupid cow.
How do you organize a space-themed party? You planet.
I am not a vegetarian because I love animals. I am a vegetarian because I hate plants.
You don't need a parachute to go sky-diving. You need a parachute to go sky-diving twice.
My grandfather has the heart of a lion. And a lifetime ban from the zoo.
Did you hear about the mathematician who's afraid of negative numbers?
What did the Buddhist say to the hot dog vendor? Make me one with everything.
I got my daughter a fridge for her birthday. I can’t wait to see her face light up when she opens it.
